amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to replace the deduction in the underlying bill with a deduction for small businesses for the amounts they spend on capital investments in 2012.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment (A002) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Levin.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 175 - 236 (Roll no. 175).
